pageContext.claim: “So when somebody writes a story or does a story on television and I know it's false, I know it's fake, and when they say they have, '15 sources have said' and I know there's no sources.”
pageContext.analysis: This is disingenuous. The White House, the State Department and the Pentagon often provide background briefings to reporters on condition that the names of officials not be disclosed. Trump himself famously has been an unidentified source for reporters. He even tweeted about information he's received from unidentified sources.
